Smith.name: Smithing Stone
Smith.description: Randomly upgrade 1 card from your deck.
Smith.message: There are no cards available to upgrade.

CrystalHaniwa.name: OOPArts
CrystalHaniwa.description: At the start of the next 2 elite or boss fights, apply 3 Vulnerable and 3 Weak to all enemies.

Key.name: A Key
Key.description: A strange key you picked up. Its use is unknown.

Challenge.name: Challenge Ticket
Challenge.description: The next room will be a random elite fight.

PotionSlot.name: Potion Slot
PotionSlot.description: Gain 1 additional potion slot and receive 1 random potion.

Telephone.name: Sora's Telephone
Telephone.description: Sora’s shop will appear in Act 4, and the next shop’s prices will be reduced by 30%.
